idea: Voxtur Bio Ltd. is an in-vitro medical diagnostic company, manufacturing Clinical Laboratory Diagnostic Reagents & Testing Kits, for pathology laboratories, hospitals, clinics and field testing camps. Our “state of the art” manufacturing facilities that rolls out high quality Clinical Laboratory Diagnostic Reagents & Testing Kits, is well equipped and certified with FDA, GMP, ISO-9001:2015, ISO-13485:2016 and DSIR accreditations.
name: VOXTUR BIO LIMITED

idea:
SenseHawk is building ML based SAAS platform for the energy & infrastructure industries, that leverages automated data collection platforms like Drones to enable digitization of the Energy & Infra industries in an unprecedented way. Our easy to use web and app based interfaces, combine seamlessly with data collection automation and cloud based analytics to provide decision makers with insights that help them boost asset IRRs and improve ease of asset management. 

Our Unity platform, enables improved terrain characterization (development & pre-construction), fully automated construction monitoring (best in class and first of a kind solution globally), and panel level defect detection using drone based thermal scans for operating assets. Our initial focus has been on the Solar Sector and so far, we have delivered analytics for over 10 GWs of solar assets across various stages of the development lifecycle.
name: SenseHawk India Private Limited

idea:
BlockID by 1Kosmos revolutionizes identity management, enabling people and companies to escape from the legacy systems of paper-based documents and move into a true digital identity with unprecedented privacy, security, transparency and individual rights by leveraging the power of blockchain technology.

About 1Kosmos

idea:
